1.text:
Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Until Jul 12, Mon to Thu, 9:45 PM to 11:45 PM
No [3] trains between Times Sq-42 St, Manhattan and New Lots Av, Brooklyn
[2] [4] [N] [Q] and [R] trains provide alternate service


[3] service operates express between 148 St and Times Sq-42 St.

Travel Alternatives
For 14 St and Chambers St, take the [1] or [2]* instead.

For Park Place, Fulton St, Wall St, Clark St, Borough Hall and Hoyt St, use nearby [4] or [R] stations instead.

For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn, take the [N] [Q] or [4].

In Brooklyn, take the [4] making all stops between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and New Lots Av.

• Transfer between [3] and [1] [2] [N] [Q] [R] trains at Times Sq-42 St.
• Transfer between [N] [Q] [R] and [4] trains at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.
• Transfer between [3] and [4] trains via the [S] 42 Street Shuttle or [7] at Times Sq-42 St.

*No [2] trains between Chambers St and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr during this time.




Planned Work
SIGNAL IMPROVEMENTS | Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, beginning 10 PM each night
[2] Trains make local stops at 18 St, 23 St and 28 St in both directions in Manhattan





Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Until Jul 27, Mon to Fri, from 9:45 PM to 5 AM
No [1] trains between Chambers St and South Ferry in Manhattan

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service

[1] service operates between 242 St and Chambers St.
[SB] Buses operate between Chambers St and South Ferry.

• Transfer between trains and [SB] buses at Chambers St.

For South Ferry, take the [R] ([N] overnight) at Whitehall St. Transfer at Times Sq-42 St to/from the [1].

Show Shuttle Bus Stops [TP]

StationShuttle Bus Stop
Chambers St [ad] [2]West Broadway at Chambers St
Fulton St [ad] [2] [4] [A] [C] [J] Broadway at Vesey St (to South Ferry)
Cortlandt StBroadway at Cortlandt St (to South Ferry)
Church St at Cortlandt St (to Chambers St)
Rector StBroadway at Rector St (to South Ferry)
Trinity Pl at Rector St (to Chambers St)
Bowling Green [ad] [4]State St at Battery Pl (to Chambers St)
South Ferry-Whitehall St [N] [R]State St at South Ferry bus terminal


Note: [1] trains from Chambers St board at the downtown platform.

4.text:
Planned Work
SIGNAL MAINTENANCE | Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, from 9:45 PM to 5 AM
Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6] trains run express from Grand Central-42 St to Brooklyn Bridge in Manhattan


Trains stop at 14 St-Union Sq.

For service to 33, 28, 23 Sts, Astor Pl, Bleecker, Spring and Canal Sts, take the [6] to 14 St-Union Sq or Brooklyn Bridge and transfer to an uptown [4] local or [6].

For service from these stations, take the [4] or [6] to 14 St-Union Sq or Grand Central-42 St and transfer to a Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].

Alternate travel note:
For service from Canal St, take the [J] to Chambers St-Brooklyn Bridge.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri • Jul 17 - 20, Tue to Fri, from 9:45 PM to 5 AM
Downtown [6] trains skip 116, 110, 103, 96, 77, 68 and 51 Sts in Manhattan


For service to these stations, take the [6] to 59 St or Grand Central-42 St and transfer to an uptown [4] local or [6].

For service from these stations, take the [4] or [6] to 59 St or 125 St and transfer to a downtown [6].

Alternate travel note:
Transfer between uptown and downtown trains with Unlimited Ride MetroCard at 86 St.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, beginning 8:30 PM each night
[5] Service ends early between E 180 St, the Bronx and Bowling Green, Manhattan
[2] [4] trains provide alternate service


[5] service operates between Dyre Av and E 180 St.

Travel Alternatives
• Transfer between [5] and [2] trains at E 180 St.
• Transfer between [2] and [4] trains at 149 St-Grand Concourse.

Reminder: Late night [5] service operates as scheduled in the Bronx.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
ALTERNATIVE SERVICE | Until Aug 9, Mon to Thu, beginning 9:45 PM each night (except Jul 16)
[4] Trains replace the [3] between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and New Lots Av in Brooklyn


[4] trains make stops between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and New Lots Av.

TRACK REPLACEMENT | Until Jul 27, Mon to Fri, 6 AM to 10 AM and 3 PM to 10 PM
[7D] Express trains make local stops in both directions at 33, 40, 46, 52, 69 and 74 Sts


Rush hour [7D] express service runs between Mets-Willets Point and 74 St-Broadway

For Midtown Manhattan, consider [E] and [F] service via transfer at 74 St-Broadway/Roosevelt Av.

A.name: ACE
A.text:
Service Change  Posted: 07/11/2018  8:44PM

Southbound [A] and Rockaway Park [S] trains are bypassing Beach 105 St because of a person struck by a train at Beach 105 St.

 



Service Change  Posted: 07/11/2018  8:07PM

Some northbound [A] trains are running local from Euclid Av to Broadway Junction because of signal problems at Broadway Junction.

Expect delays in [A] and [C] train service.



Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, 9:45 PM to 11:35 PM
No [C] trains between 145 St and 168 St in Manhattan
[A] trains provide alternate service


[C] service operates between 145 St and Euclid Av.
[A] trains make local stops at 135 St and 155 St.

• Transfer between trains at 125 St (across the platform) or 145 St.

Note: 163 St-Amsterdam Av is closed for renovation.

Reminder: [C] trains do not operate overnight.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, 9:45 PM to 11:15 PM
Euclid Av-bound [C] trains skip Liberty Av, Van Siclen Av and Shepherd Av in Brooklyn


For service to these stations, take the [C] to Euclid Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [C].

For service from these stations, take the [C] to Broadway Junction and transfer to a Euclid Av-bound [C].




Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, beginning 10 PM each night
[A] Trains make local stops in both directions at 155 St and 135 St in Manhattan


Note: 163 St-Amsterdam Av is closed for renovation.




Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, 10:15 PM to 11:30 PM
Uptown [C] trains skip 135 St in Manhattan - Take the [A] instead


• Transfer between trains at 125 St.

[A] trains make the local stop at 135 St during this time.




Planned Work
ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018
No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av
No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel


[A] trains run between Inwood-207 St, Manhattan and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, Queens.

The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately every 15 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Far Rockaway-Mott Av service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.

For Broad Channel [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.

[ad] For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.

B.name: BDFM
B.text:
Delays  Posted: 07/11/2018  9:25PM

[F] and [G] train service has resumed following an earlier incident involving a passenger in need of medical assistance at Bergen St.

Planned Work
STATION ENHANCEMENTS | Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, 8:15 PM to 11:30 PM
[M] Service ends early between 71 Av, Queens and Essex St, Manhattan

[E] [F] [R] trains provide alternate service

[M] service operates between Essex St and Metropolitan Av.

Travel Alternatives:
[R] trains make all [M] stops between 71 Av and Queens Plaza.
[E] trains make all [M] stops between Queens Plaza and 5 Av/53 St.
[F] trains make all [M] stops between 47-50 Sts and Delancey St/Essex St.

• Transfer between [F] and [R] trains at Roosevelt Av or 34 St-Herald Sq.
• Transfer between [E] and [F] trains at W 4 St.
• Transfer between [F] and [M] trains at Delancey St/Essex St.

Note: Brooklyn-bound [F] trains make all [M] stops from Queens Plaza to 5 Av/53 St after 9:45 PM, Mon to Fri.

Please use the following guide to arrive at your station before end of service.

To 71 Av: To Metropolitan Av:
Metropolitan Av8:33 PM 71 Av8:23 PM
Myrtle Av8:45 PMRoosevelt Av8:33 PM
Essex St8:58 PMQueens Plaza8:43 PM
W 4 St9:07 PM47-50 Sts8:52 PM
47-50 Sts9:15 PMB'way-Lafayette St9:02 PM

Reminder: Late night [M] service operates between Metropolitan Av and Myrtle Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
STRUCTURAL IMPROVEMENTS | Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, from 9:30 PM to 5 AM
No [F] trains between 18 Av and Stillwell Av in Brooklyn

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service

[F] service operates between 179 St and 18 Av.

[SB] Buses operate between 18 Av and Stillwell Av, stopping at Avenue I, Bay Pkwy, Avenue N, Avenue P,
Kings Hwy, Avenue U, Avenue X, Neptune Av and West 8 St.

For direct service between Stillwell Av and Manhattan/Downtown Brooklyn, take the [D] [N] or [Q] instead.

• Transfer between [F] trains and [SB] buses at 18 Av or Stillwell Av.
• Transfer between [D] [N] [Q] trains and [SB] buses at Stillwell Av.

Show Shuttle Bus Stops

Station[SB] Shuttle Bus Stop
18 Av [F]McDonald Av at 18 Av
Avenue IMcDonald Av at Avenue I
Bay PkwyMcDonald Av at Bay Pkwy
Avenue NMcDonald Av at Ave N (to 18 Av)
McDonald Av at 24 Av (to Stillwell Av)
Avenue PMcDonald Av at Avenue P
Kings HwyMcDonald Av at Kings Hwy
Avenue UMcDonald Av at Avenue U
Avenue XShell Rd at Avenue X (to Stillwell Av)
McDonald Av at Avenue X (to Church Av)
Neptune AvShell Rd at Neptune Av (to Stillwell Av)
W 6 St at station entrance (to Church Av)
W 8 St [Q]Surf Av at W 8 St
Stillwell Av [ad] [DS] [NS] [QS]Stillwell Av at Surf Av


[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.






Planned Work
STATION ENHANCEMENTS | Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, from 9:45 PM to 5 AM
Brooklyn-bound [F] trains run via the [E] from Roosevelt Av, Queens to 5 Av/53 St, Manhattan


Trains resume regular service at 47-50 Sts.

No Coney Island-bound [F] service at 21 St-Queensbridge, Roosevelt Island and Lexington Av/63 St.

Travel Alternatives
For service to these stations, take the [F] to 47-50 Sts and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from 21 St-Queensbridge and Roosevelt Island, take the [F] to Roosevelt Av* or, after 12:01 AM, Steinway St* and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

From Lexington Av/63 St, take the [Q] to 34 St-Herald Sq and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

*From 12:01 AM to 5 AM, [F] trains make local stop in both directions at Steinway St, Thu and Fri.

Note: 57 St is closed renovation.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, from 9:45 PM to 5 AM
Coney Island-bound [D] trains skip 182-183 Sts, 174-175 Sts and 170 St in the Bronx


For service to these stations, take the [D] to Tremont Av or 167 St and transfer to a Norwood-bound [D].

For service from these stations, take the [D] to Tremont Av or Fordham Rd and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D].




Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, beginning 8:30 PM each night
[B] Service ends early


Take the [A] [C] [D] and/or [Q] trains.

• Transfer at 59 St-Columbus Circle [A] [C] [D], 34 St-Herald Sq [D] [Q] and/or Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr [D] [Q].

Reminder: [B] trains do not operate overnight.

D.text:
Delays  Posted: 07/11/2018  9:25PM

[F] and [G] train service has resumed following an earlier incident involving a passenger in need of medical assistance at Bergen St.

Planned Work
STATION ENHANCEMENTS | Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, 8:15 PM to 11:30 PM
[M] Service ends early between 71 Av, Queens and Essex St, Manhattan

[E] [F] [R] trains provide alternate service

[M] service operates between Essex St and Metropolitan Av.

Travel Alternatives:
[R] trains make all [M] stops between 71 Av and Queens Plaza.
[E] trains make all [M] stops between Queens Plaza and 5 Av/53 St.
[F] trains make all [M] stops between 47-50 Sts and Delancey St/Essex St.

• Transfer between [F] and [R] trains at Roosevelt Av or 34 St-Herald Sq.
• Transfer between [E] and [F] trains at W 4 St.
• Transfer between [F] and [M] trains at Delancey St/Essex St.

Note: Brooklyn-bound [F] trains make all [M] stops from Queens Plaza to 5 Av/53 St after 9:45 PM, Mon to Fri.

Please use the following guide to arrive at your station before end of service.

To 71 Av: To Metropolitan Av:
Metropolitan Av8:33 PM 71 Av8:23 PM
Myrtle Av8:45 PMRoosevelt Av8:33 PM
Essex St8:58 PMQueens Plaza8:43 PM
W 4 St9:07 PM47-50 Sts8:52 PM
47-50 Sts9:15 PMB'way-Lafayette St9:02 PM

Reminder: Late night [M] service operates between Metropolitan Av and Myrtle Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
STRUCTURAL IMPROVEMENTS | Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, from 9:30 PM to 5 AM
No [F] trains between 18 Av and Stillwell Av in Brooklyn

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service

[F] service operates between 179 St and 18 Av.

[SB] Buses operate between 18 Av and Stillwell Av, stopping at Avenue I, Bay Pkwy, Avenue N, Avenue P,
Kings Hwy, Avenue U, Avenue X, Neptune Av and West 8 St.

For direct service between Stillwell Av and Manhattan/Downtown Brooklyn, take the [D] [N] or [Q] instead.

• Transfer between [F] trains and [SB] buses at 18 Av or Stillwell Av.
• Transfer between [D] [N] [Q] trains and [SB] buses at Stillwell Av.

Brooklyn-bound [F] trains run via the [E] from Roosevelt Av, Queens to 5 Av/53 St, Manhattan


Trains resume regular service at 47-50 Sts.

No Coney Island-bound [F] service at 21 St-Queensbridge, Roosevelt Island and Lexington Av/63 St.

Travel Alternatives
For service to these stations, take the [F] to 47-50 Sts and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from 21 St-Queensbridge and Roosevelt Island, take the [F] to Roosevelt Av* or, after 12:01 AM, Steinway St* and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

From Lexington Av/63 St, take the [Q] to 34 St-Herald Sq and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

*From 12:01 AM to 5 AM, [F] trains make local stop in both directions at Steinway St, Thu and Fri.

Note: 57 St is closed renovation.

G.name: G
G.text:
Delays  Posted: 07/11/2018  9:25PM

[F] and [G] train service has resumed following an earlier incident involving a passenger in need of medical assistance at Bergen St.

S.name: S
S.text:
Service Change  Posted: 07/11/2018  8:44PM

Southbound [A] and Rockaway Park [S] trains are bypassing Beach 105 St because of a person struck by a train at Beach 105 St.

 



Planned Work
ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018
No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av
No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel


[A] trains run between Inwood-207 St, Manhattan and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, Queens.

The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately every 15 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Far Rockaway-Mott Av service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.

For Broad Channel [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.

[ad] For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.
